sentence: Oz is out: Dr. Mehmet Oz, a U.S. Senate candidate and host of the long-running "The Dr. Oz Show," was fired from a presidential council, according to a statement released Wednesday by his campaign.

sentence: “Carpet-bagging” Republican U.S. Senate candidate Dr. Mehmet Oz is being mocked for a video that shows him in a supermarket shopping for ingredients for crudité, and complaining that the ingredients – totaling he says about $20 – are too expensive, and President Joe Biden is to blame.
author: David Badash
title: Mockery Greets Dr. Oz’s Hilarious Campaign Video Of Fake Grocery Shopping (VIDEO)

sentence: Trump’s been feeling some intense backlash for endorsing Dr. Mehmet Oz in a Senate race out of Pennsylvania.

title: Trump’s Poorly-Attended Weekend Rally Included Bragging So Silly That His Own Crowd Began Laughing
